methods.addBaseEntry:
When we track data from other threads that should be attributed to this operation, we tack extra
 BasePerformanceEntry values onto this nugget when it is closed.

 The CPU time, reads, and allocations are counted against this nugget. Wall clock time is ignored.

:param baseEntry: io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.perf.BasePerformanceEntry
methods.close:
AutoCloseable implementation - wraps the no-argument version of done() used by query code outside of the
 QueryPerformance(Recorder/Nugget), reporting successful completion to the thread-local QueryPerformanceRecorder
 instance.
methods.done:
Mark this nugget QueryState.FINISHED and notify the recorder.

*Overload 1*  
  
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param recorder: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.perf.QueryPerformanceRecorder) - The recorder to notify
  :return: (boolean) if the nugget passes logging thresholds.
methods.getAllocatedBytes:
Get bytes of allocated memory attributed to the instrumented operation.

:return: (long) The bytes of allocated memory attributed to the instrumented operation, or
         QueryConstants.NULL_LONG if not enabled/supported.
methods.getCpuNanos:
Get nanoseconds of CPU time attributed to the instrumented operation.

:return: (long) The nanoseconds of CPU time attributed to the instrumented operation, or QueryConstants.NULL_LONG
         if not enabled/supported.
methods.getDiffCollectionTimeNanos: :return: (long) Time spent in garbage collection, in milliseconds, between time of completion and creation
methods.getDiffCollections: :return: (long) Number of garbage collections between time of completion and creation
methods.getDiffFreeMemory: :return: (long) free memory difference between time of completion and creation
methods.getDiffTotalMemory: :return: (long) total (allocated high water mark) memory difference between time of completion and creation
methods.getPoolAllocatedBytes:
Get bytes of allocated pooled/reusable memory attributed to the instrumented operation.

:return: (long) The bytes of allocated pooled/reusable memory attributed to the instrumented operation, or
         QueryConstants.NULL_LONG if not enabled/supported.
methods.getStartClockTime: :return: (long) wall clock time in milliseconds from the epoch
methods.getTotalTimeNanos: :return: (java.lang.Long) nanoseconds elapsed, once state != QueryState.RUNNING() has been called.
methods.getUserCpuNanos:
Get nanoseconds of user mode CPU time attributed to the instrumented operation.

:return: (long) The nanoseconds of user mode CPU time attributed to the instrumented operation, or
         QueryConstants.NULL_LONG if not enabled/supported.
methods.setShouldLogMeAndStackParents: Ensure this nugget gets logged, alongside its stack of nesting operations.
methods.shouldLogMenAndStackParents:
:return: (boolean) true if this nugget triggers the logging of itself and every other nugget in its stack of nesting
         operations.
methods.wasInterrupted: :return: (boolean) true if this nugget was interrupted by an abort() call.

text:
Per-operation instrumentation node for hierarchical performance recording. Note that this class has an unusually
 intimate relationship with another class, QueryPerformanceRecorder. Changes to either should take this lack
 of encapsulation into account.
